section.title: Have Questions?
section.description: Find answers to common questions about the IPO process and our consulting services.

questions.question: What are the main requirements for IPO in Indonesia?

answer.intro: Main IPO requirements in Indonesia include:
requirements: Minimum paid-up capital of IDR 3 billion
Audited financial statements for the last 3 years with unqualified opinion for at least the last 2 years
Profit for at least the last 1 year
Compliance with corporate governance requirements set by OJK

questions.question: How long does the IPO process take?
questions.answer: The IPO process in Indonesia generally takes 6-12 months, depending on company readiness and market conditions. Timeline includes: Internal preparation and restructuring (2-4 months), Due diligence and prospectus preparation (2-3 months), OJK approval process (45-90 working days), Bookbuilding and Public Offering (1-2 months). Global Sinergi Kapital uses modern methodology to ensure efficient process.

questions.question: What are the costs required for IPO?
questions.answer: IPO costs vary depending on offering size, but generally range from 3-7% of total funds raised. Cost components include: Underwriting fee (2-4%), Consultant fees (Legal, accounting, IPO advisor), OJK and IDX fees (Registration and listing fees), Notary fees (For legal documents), Marketing and roadshow costs (Investor promotion), Prospectus printing costs (Document printing). Global Sinergi Kapital offers competitive and transparent fee structure.

questions.question: What are the main stages in the IPO process?
How is the IPO valuation and price determined?
questions.answer: IPO valuation determination uses various methods: Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) for cash flow projections, Price to Earnings (P/E) ratio compared with peers, Price to Book Value (PBV) for asset-heavy companies, Enterprise Value/EBITDA for operational comparison. Our expert team will conduct in-depth analysis of industry, competitors, and market conditions to determine optimal and attractive valuation for investors.

questions.question: What services does Global Sinergi Kapital provide?
How much does IPO consultant service cost?
questions.answer: IPO consultation fees vary depending on company complexity and size. GSK offers various packages from initial evaluation to full assistance. We can provide a custom proposal after initial assessment.

questions.question: What are company obligations after IPO?

obligations: Compliance with OJK and IDX regulations

questions.question: Does GSK provide post-IPO services?
questions.answer: Yes, GSK provides post-IPO support services including corporate action advisory, periodic report preparation assistance, investor relations, and ongoing regulatory compliance consultation.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Other Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Our expert team is ready to help answer specific questions about your company's situation.
